body: This is just voyeurism... My hand approves...This is not netorare or netori, no one is being stolen either.
This is not netorare. Is just voyerism
It's not NTR, its simply a story of two people, and the girl has a cuckquean fetish.
I'd call it attempted NTR? On the part of the glasses girl in the second chapter at least.

they aren't even dating, they just like each other, but she refuses to date him so it won't even be cheating, she just seriously gets off on him being with others...you can't even label it cheating let alone ntr...

I mean, I consider anyone stealing a persons girlfriend/boyfriend NTR. A lot of people just get angry/jealous at the mentality of people trying to take another persons lover, regardless of who is doing it. However I agree this isn't really NTR, since he's not really being stolen and she's totally cool with it. Because yeah there IS a difference between cheating and NTR.
@Rofllcat Stop spurting bullshit from your ass, you obviously dont know jack shit about netorare

This is NOT netorare, first of all the main girl obviously doesnt really love mc but uses him for her netorase fetish, since there is no real love it cant be called ntr, second of all there is no stealing aspect of ntr here, at best it can be called cheating but since there is no real loving relationship between two it cant be really called that either , not to mention in order to be ntr it has to be a guy doing the stealing  not a girl otherwise ntr becomes pointless as it doesnt cause the usual feeling of jealousy and anger as it's not the guy who is doing the stealing

@XFantasy7 is totally NTR man, netorare comes from those couples that gather with others to make an orgy, they get turned on watching their mate having sex with someone else, netorare doesn't always have to involve 1 guy mind breaking some other guy's bitch behind his back xD
is this really ntr? I mean, hes not really being stolen, hes still in love with her, hes just basically having sex with anyone but her, and that seems to really get her off
I don't know what to think of this...
If only this wasn't so censored then it would be fantastic.
